text: Chlormint is a product line of chewing gum and breath mint candies made by Perfetti Van Melle, India. It was used in a show called "Deal Ya No Deal" as one of the prizes, and it was a best mint selling company in India at its time. ==See also== * List of breath mints * List of chewing gum brands ==External links== * * Perfetti Van Melle brand information for Chlormint Category:Chewing gum Category:Perfetti Van Melle brands Category:Breath mints Category:Indian confectionery Category:Indian brands
title: Chlormint
